meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or involving two or more nations.
meanings.sent1: The conference had an international audience from many countries.
meanings.sent2: The company's success led to international expansion.
meanings.sent3: The international potluck at work showcased dishes from around the world.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an international language that everyone understood.
meanings.sent5: The internet has made communication international and instant.

meanings.definition: A person who is a citizen of more than one country.
meanings.sent1: As an international, she had to abide by the laws of both countries.
meanings.sent2: The school welcomed many internationals from diverse backgrounds.
meanings.sent3: The internationals at the embassy party shared stories of their dual citizenship.
meanings.sent4: He felt like an international bridge between two cultures.
meanings.sent5: The internationals formed a close-knit community in the foreign land.
